title: Beautiful German philosophy books
content:
I came across these beautiful books while visiting Berlin.  
Anyone know the font?? Is it some kind of compressed Bodoni or Caslon?  
Any other information about the books whould be kindly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163158im_/http:/typophile.com/files/philosophy_books_4956.jpg)

 [‹ Looking for a digitised version of Touraine from Cassandre & Peignot](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163158/http:/typophile.com/node/34402 "Go to previous forum topic") [maybe morris sans, any other suggestions? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163158/http:/typophile.com/node/50769 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Gregers™

comments.content:
“Times Modern Black”, _invented_ by Willy Fleckhaus and Rolf Staudt for Suhrkamp about 30 years ago.  
See [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163158/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31845).

Cheers Jan

It is allways nice to have your knowledge increased about past designers, whom we have to honor and pay respect to.  
Just regret i didn´t buy the books now.
